targets.expr:
sum(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls) /
 count(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls)
or on() vector(0)

panels.description:
Blue  = PostgreSQL

Red = Pgbouncer

Yellow : Agent (Patroni / PG Exporters)
panels.title: Instances

panels.description:
PostgreSQL Cluster Load 5
Load = active session time / total cpu time

PostgreSQL Instance Load 1
Load = active session time / total cpu time

targets.expr:
sum(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls) /
 count(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls)
or on() vector(0)

panels.description:
How long since patroni the HA agent successfully connect to DCS:etcd.

value larger than 20s needs extra attention
panels.title: DCS Last Seen

targets.expr:
(sum by (cls,proxy) (haproxy_server_status{proxy=~'.*-.*', state='UP'}) > bool 0)
 # or (min by (cls,proxy) (min_over_time(haproxy_server_status{proxy=~'.*-.*', state='UP'}[15m])) * 0)

panels.description:
Business Database among this cluster
Value means current connections

Click goes to PGSQL Database Dashboard
panels.title: Database
